name: War Truck
description:
The world, under attack, the aliens, super dumb, you, a plasma rifle. Guess what happens next. Protect the earth from the evil aliens and fight to survive the night.

Thanks to Simon from Slamon Salmon for playtesting the game, it really helped.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_99Kmy_qQBwmxKZrhKvglw
